articles.title: OJ Simpson, American football star turned celebrity murder defendant, dead at 76 - DAWN.com
articles.description: He died on Wednesday after a battle with cancer.
articles.content: OJ Simpson, the American football star and actor who was acquitted in a sensational 1995 trial of murdering his former wife but was found responsible for her death in a civil lawsuit and was later im… [+7368 chars]
